Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its innovative features and unparalleled performance, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing top-tier solutions to our esteemed clients. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
